Hive is building the first online marketplace that makes it easy to buy what you believe in. Hive curate's brands that craft excellent products (delicious foods, household goods that really do the job) while improving the world. Hive practice's carbon neutral shipping that is fast and free. And Hive make's an impact visible to shoppers while ensuring that partners uphold their high standards. Hive's mission is to build a company that not only earns financial profits, but also improves people’s lives and the planet.
Brightland was born to elevate the simple, analog moments in the kitchen. Brightland's hero products are consciously crafted extra virgin olive oils and fruit-forward vinegars from California. ⁠
alt: KCLLC Investment in Brightland Olive Oil

description: Non-alcoholic beverage company founded by Katy Perry and Morgan McLachlan.⁠
